price: Yewe muntu! N’iki cyaguteye kwirengagiza Nyagasani wawe, Nyirubutagatifu?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
